jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
After holding the map up to the car window, Lorraine suddenly moves it away. The sudden noise and movement accompanied by the tension of the scene may startle some people
As Lorraine looks into the rear view mirror during a tense scene, the car horn suddenly blares
As Ed says “that should do it” and lowers the bonnet, Lorraine sees a group of ghosts standing behind him, seconds later one of the ghosts pushes Ed to the ground
A truck suddenly appears out of the fog and almost runs Ed over
A box on the shelf suddenly closes startling Daniela
As Daniela approaches the empty rocking chair, the door suddenly slams closed
As the camera pans across to Daniela, we see the disfigured face of her father beside her and he screams “you did this to me!”
As the door to the chicken coup closes, we here loud snarling noises from the dog outside
As Mary Ellen holds the silver coin up, the Ferryman suddenly appears in front of her
Judy is suddenly pulled towards the end of the bed
Accompanied by a sound effect, Judy is pulled back once again
Judy looks under the bed sheets and sees Annabelle, suddenly a girl jumps out of the sheets ad attacks Judy
After seeing the shadow of the demon on her wall, the demon suddenly appears beside Judy
After Judy escapes the bedroom and reunites with Mary Ellen, the door is pushed open and we hear a demonic roar
As Daniela says “everything”, all the objects in the room suddenly turn on at once
The bride suddenly grabs Daniela around the neck
One of the windows in the car breaks startling Judy
The dog suddenly jumps on the roof of the car
The Mary Ellen doppelganger holding Annabelle suddenly screams
As Judy attempts to put Annabelle back in her case, the door shuts and Judy turns around to see the demon right behind her
After Scarlett puts down the phone, a man’s voice starts talking from behind the group
Mole, the presumed dead friend of one of the group members, jumps at the group when approached by Souxie. [Video]
The ghost jumps again when further approached
Benji gets attacked by a lady
A sculpture on the wall breaks off and attacks the group
A hand reaches out of the water and grabs Scarlett
Scarlett lifts the sack on a hanging person’s head when that person jumps at her. [Video]
Blood splatters on the neighbors’ wall
John runs out of the neighbors house
An unseen force pulls Mia towards the fire
The curtain suddenly blows into Mia’s face and she falls to the ground, a few seconds later a young girl runs past her
A young girl runs at Mia and becomes a full grown adult as she barges through the door
Mia looks in a baby pram and a black hand grabs her wrist
A black figure is lying at the bottom of the staircase and its face flashes on the screen
As Mia looks under the door at her baby, Annabelle’s face pops up under the other side of the door
An unseen force blows Father Perez back as he goes to enter the church
Father Perez knocks on Mia’s door with his back facing away from it. Mia opens the door and the father shouts “May god have mercy on your soul!”
A black figure jumps down from the ceiling of the house
A torch is briefly shone on a figure before the camera footage cuts out
A loud bang startles James in his tent
Lisa suddenly bursts into James’ tent
There is a burst of static from the walkie-talkie during a quiet scene
Lane suddenly appears in front of Talia and James
Something appears to pull Peter away and the camera footage cuts out
Ashley suddenly pulls Lisa’s hand away from the camera
James startles Lisa
The camera gradually approaches the back of Talia’s head and she suddenly screams
A branch snaps and a hysterical Talia appears in front of James
A tent flies into the air
An unseen force pulls Ashley out of the tree
A flash of lightning illuminates the room and a woman can briefly be seen watching James
A disheveled Lane suddenly appears in front of Lisa
Lane runs at Lisa while screaming
There are several loud whooshing noises
Lane sees a tall thin figure coming towards her in a hallway
James runs into Lisa
Something bumps into the car and it violently shakes
The camera cuts from the driver to a man standing in the road
The woman suddenly screams while driving, followed by a cut to a deformed looking man on the car window
A vulture suddenly screeches and flies into the car through a side window
There is a wide shot of some ruins while Paul is driving down a road. Suddenly, a burnt hand appears on one of the bricks accompanied by a string sound effect
Paul reaches in for the water, and Djinn’s hand suddenly reaches out of it and grabs him
Sue reaches down to put flowers on Carrie’s grave however a bloodied hand reaches out of the ground and grabs her. [Video]
A boy bangs on the car window, startling Carrie
A girl smashing into the window in front of Sue may startle some viewers
Carrie’s mother, who appears to be dead, suddenly gasps
(alternative ending)  As Sue lies on the surgical table after giving birth, a bloodied hand suddenly appears. [Video]
While Faith walks through the house in a dream sequence, her father suddenly drops down from the ceiling right in front of her face
Faith looks to her side and there is a cut to some masked coven members standing in the room accompanied by a sound effect
Faith leans forwards and Sissy is revealed to be standing behind her
There is a cut with a sound effect to a masked coven member watching Amy from a window
Faith says “My son is the devil,” followed by a cut to the child and a quick zoom as his face becomes distorted
The toy’s sudden noise may startle some viewers
Eric gets scared by Sara when she opens the bathroom door
The toy’s noise startles Eric
A loud sound comes from the walkie-talkie
After a tense scene, Daniel’s hand suddenly covers Eric’s mouth
The TV turns on loudly
Daniel jumping from the chair after hearing to Eric’s voice along with a loud sound may startle some viewers
Daniel’s voice scares Ruth
The voice of Ruth interrupting the silent tense scene may startle some viewers
After a tense scene, a loud noise comes out of Gérman’s headphones
The screen cuts abruptly to a woman screaming
A toy’s noise spooks Sara
When Sara tries to touch Eric, he quickly crawls under the bed
Eric jumps off the bed to the front of Sara
The witch puts her hand on Sara’s face accompanied by a loud noise
The hanged body of Sara bursts through the room’s window
Something jumps on Daniel
A gunshot is fired frightening Ruth and Gérman
The scene cuts abruptly to a man yelling
A screaming woman runs by in front of Gérman
The witch jumps on Gérman
The witch screams at Ruth twice
Eric runs past Daniel accompanied by a loud sound
The witch screams at Daniel
Some viewers might get scared when Ruth shows up in front of Gérman
Eric’s voice on the walkie-talkie may startle some viewers
In a post-credit scene, a woman being exorcised jumps and screams
The doors burst open
Ganush charges at Christine
A handkerchief suddenly appears in front of Christine’s windscreen
Ganush attacks Christine in the car
Ganush attacks Christine again
Rham Jas suddenly has a vision of a fiery demon as he is reading Christine’s fortune. [Video]
A gust of wind startles Christine
The pots in the kitchen start to clatter into each other
An unseen force knocks Christine back
Ganush suddenly appears in bed beside Christine. [Video]
The silhouette of Lamia pops up in front of Christine
The image of Ganush suddenly appears on Christine’s phone
Lamia appears at the window in front of Christine
A black cat hisses at Christine
Christine pulls back a curtain in the shed to reveal Ganush. [Video]
The sound of a goat bleating startles Christine
There is a loud noise as the spirit enters Shaun
Chrstine goes to check on the assistant, but he turns around suddenly revealing he has been possessed
Christine sees Ganush on the road
Ganush’s handkerchief appears on Chrstine’s windscreen while she is driving
The handkerchief comes out of the fan vent and lands on Christine’s face
Christine pulls at the corpse of Ganush and it suddenly comes free
Ganush’s corpse pops up out of the water
A body falls and hits a truck
An elevator drops down close to the building’s repairman
Someone falls onto the top of the elevator causing a loud bang
The devil appears from behind the people who are still alive

movies.title: Errementari: The Blacksmith and the Devil

jump_scares.spoiler: A snake suddenly gets hit by a stone
A bird flies into the window of Charlie’s classroom however we see the bird flying towards the window beforehand which substantially reduces the impact
We see a decapitated head on the road crawling with ants (not a jump scare but some viewers might find the image disturbing)
As Annie drives home from the seance she is startled by the tongue-clicking noise that her daughter makes
After the seance at home, Peter starts to freak out however this is interrupted when a glass cabinet suddenly breaks
Shortly after Annie says “Charlie, what’s wrong?” the candle on the table flares up
Peter thinks he sees Charlie in the corner of the room but it turns out to be a ball that drops and rolls across the floor. After a short pause, an arm suddenly grabs Peter around the head
Peter hears a loud noise from upstairs

During a very tense scene, Peter sees a naked man in the doorway. He then looks up to the ceiling where Annie previously was but no one is there. Suddenly, Annie rushes at him from the corner of the room
The principal suddenly closes the blinds as Gary stares at Lucas
Karl startles Gary by putting his hand on Gary’s back
Gary closes the fridge door to reveal Lucas sitting on the kitchen table
When Gary looks back at the swing Lucas is gone (this is accompanied by a loud sound effect)
Accompanied by a sound effect, Gary suddenly shines the torch into an empty room
One of the toys in Lucas’s room begins talking
Gary looks through a hole int he door and the goat puppet suddenly appears
A sound effect plays as Jeremiah becomes agitated when asking Marlene to fetch Brother Swan
As the lights flicker, the Black Skulls suddenly grab Red and Mandy from their beds
Accompanied by a sound effect, Red looks in a bedroom to see a dead couple covered in blood
There is a loud gunshot and the television blows out
As Red tastes the contents of the jar, he violently hallucinates and some unsettling imagery flashes across the screen
After entering the toilet, we see a figure in the mirror watching Dani. A few seconds later Dani runs out of the toilet and this is accompanied by some loud dissonant strings in the soundtrack

Josh is distracted by a person (who he believes to be Mark) entering the temple behind him. After he turns around and tells him “we’re not supposed to be here”, he is hit over the head by an unseen assailant
After witnessing Simon’s body being displayed ritualistically, Christian sits back up and a man blows some powder into Christian’s eyes
There is a loud noise and Dennis falls flat
As the camera zooms in on Kristi the power suddenly cuts out
A ball is thrown at the camera
Some sort of spirit flies past the camera
Mike appears behind Skylar
Something flies out of the pool
Leila appears in front of the camera
The bathroom mirror cracks
The dark entity flies at the camera
A figure suddenly rushes at the camera accompanied by a loud noise
Something falls down in front of the camera, startling Emily
Leila suddenly walks in on Ryan and Mike who are looking at camera footage
A Santa toy suddenly turns on
Emma begins talking behind Ryan
Something bangs on the bedroom window
A dark entity bursts through the window behind Emily
Leila suddenly attacks Father Todd
The dark entity rushes past the camera
A toy turns on
The entity whooshes past the camera
An abrupt camera change may startle some viewers
The dark entity can briefly be seen as Leila’s bedroom door suddenly closes
Some sort of force radiates out from the hole in Leila’s wall
The entity suddenly strangles and drags away Father Todd
A hand impales Ryan through the chest
Emily turns the camera night vision on and Katie is shown to be standing in front of the camera
Emily turns around to see Leila watching her
Toby’s foot lands in front of the camera
The camera abruptly cuts off
(Night #5) Katie suddenly wakes up out of bed gasping for air
(Night #5) The noise of something banging comes from another room
(Night #13) The couple wake up in their bed and a loud noise sounds from another room, followed by a bang
(Night #15) Micah enters the house again where he hears a bang
(Night #18) The bedroom door slams shut
(Night #18) The door slams shut again
Something bangs upstairs
(Night #21) Katie begins to scream loudly
(Night #21) Micah’s body is hurled at the screen from the doorway. (theatrical version) [Video]
(Night #21) Katie crawls up to the screen and lunges at it as her face begins to turn demonic. (theatrical version) [Video]
Dennis turns around and gasps as Kristi is standing right behind him
A photo-frame falls off the wall as an earthquake begins suddenly
Julie jumps out of the closet wearing a mask, scaring Dennis and Randy. [Video]
Dennis bursts into the bedroom
There is a loud bang in the kitchen as the blinds snap shut
There is a loud thump as Julie enters the bathroom where the two girls are playing bloody Mary
There is a loud bang in the kitchen while Julie has her hand in the garbage disposal unit
Katie crawls into a cupboard and the door slams shut behind her
As the camera pans back to the kitchen, the babysitter’s face suddenly appears in front of it
The camera pans back to the kitchen and there is a figure covered by a blanket standing behind the  babysitter. The blanket crumples to the floor as the babysitter turns around
The babysitter goes to look at something but there is a whooshing noise and she is pushed back
There is a hissing noise and Randi is attacked by something while the lights are off
The table and chairs in the children’s room are suddenly pushed over
An invisible force pulls Katie off the ground by her hair
Katie’s sheets are pulled off the bed and fly towards the camera
Julie returns to the kitchen and notices everything has been removed from the kitchen, seconds later all the kitchen items fall from the ceiling. [Video]
Dennis turns on the light in the garage and a group of older women are standing in there
Julie is thrown at Dennis
Dennis opens the door slowly, and there is a whooshing noise
A now possessed Katie turns around and snarls at Dennis before throwing him backwards. [Video]
Something falls from the ceiling accompanied by a loud thud
A creature suddenly appears behind the glass
Andy quickly pans the camera to reveal one of the cultists standing next to him
Kid sees silhouette through the eye-hole of the Ouija set
The gas element suddenly lights itself
Pete jumps out as the group goes exploring through the house
Pete sees a figure in the mirror and is suddenly pushed against it
On a car window the words “Hi Friend” are written in dust  all of a sudden a hand slams against the window from the inside
Something slams against the door as the girls are listening against it
The chair slides along the ground and all of a sudden a piece of the Ouija board moves
Laine looks through the piece of the Ouija set and sees a being with a stitched mouth
Laine looks through the Ouija piece again and sees a demonic figure running towards her. [Video]
Laine sees a doll, the torch suddenly moves by itself and reveals a silhouette stepping out across the other side of the attic
Trevor gets grabbed by something
A lady appears behind Laine
Debbie morphs into a demonic girl then screams
Trevor walks towards the pool and spins around to see a screaming decomposed face  he is then thrown back into the pool. [Video]
Laine spins Trevor around to reveal that he has no eyes and his mouth is sewn shut
Sarah is grabbed and pulled into a hole in the wall
The priest starts screaming as his hands burn on the altar
Rawhead bursts through the crates
Rawhead grabs the woman through the door

While spoiling as little as possible, during a scene in which Amanda is in bed and Maud is next to her, Amanda says something that upsets Maud, causing her to begin crying. A few seconds later, Amanda suddenly springs upwards and her face looks distorted

Hard to describe without spoiling as it is literally the final shot of the movie, but can roughly be described as a scene in which Maud is lifting her arms and people are bowing down, there is a sudden cut to her screaming
Sarah leaves the toilet cubicle and sees the casting director standing outside
Sarah’s fit abruptly ends
A light suddenly illuminates Sarah
The dark room is lit up several times over the next minute or so as a camera takes photos of Sarah
Several images flash quickly across the screen (a couple of which show Sarah with blood around her mouth)
There is a flash and Sarah falls to the floor
A bright light appears on the screen accompanied by a sound effect
The casting director grabs Sarah through the bed sheet
The door closes by itself and Sarah grabs Tracy
Some viewers might be startled at two stabbings at this point
Woman says “talk to me” and turns to see a man in front of her
Woman says “talk to me” again and a woman appears in front of her
Woman barks like a dog suddenly
Man says “I let you in” and head tilts backwards
Boy bites girl in the hand
Some viewers might be startled at man lunging at woman
After a long period if silence, a door slams loudly
Gray jumps out at Deacon as he investigates a strange noise. [Video]
Gray turns and is startled by a dog standing in front of him
There is a loud noise as Mark appears to hit his head on something
A book falls to the floor
A door slams
The crucifix falls off the wall
Father Crellick who appears to be dead, suddenly grabs Gray by the arm
Deacon kicks a beer can during a tense scene
Several lights suddenly explode
A panicked Gray runs into Deacon
The camera cuts out for several seconds before coming back to Gray who is screaming in agony
A basketball hits Cole in the head as the title credits show on the screen
The camera pans around to reveal Bee watching Cole as he attempts to jump out the window
Cole backs into Sam’s corpse
Sonya slams her fist into some couragated iron near where Cole is hiding
Max is suddenly behind Cole
There is a loud sound effect as Cole bumps into something (but it’s only a potplant)
Alison grabs Cole around the leg
Alison is suddenly shot in the head (with gory results)
Larry looks inside a window and sees a white-eyed woman
A telephone rings
A hand reaches out through a dissolving hole in a wall, and attacks Joe
The camera zooms in on Martha, and immediately after the camera switches over on a decomposing corpse, floating on the surface in some water
The camera switches over to the white-eyed woman
As Mary-Ann begins to scream, the Camera zooms in on her
Jill turns around and sees two corpses
Jill opens a door and runs into a one-eyed zombie
Jill opens her eyes and reveals that her eyes are now white
As Emily puts her hands on a painting, a bell suddenly stars ringing
when Emily takes her hands off the painting, she sees that her hands are bleeding
After entering room 36, Liza opens the bathroom door, and sees Schweick’s corpse nailed on the wall
Liza looks through a window, and the camera suddenly shifts and zooms in on the book of Eibon
As martin looks through a book, a unseen force knocks him off the ladder
Martha discovers a re-animated Joe in the bathtub, that attacks her
The camera shifts over on a piano, that suddenly starts playing
Emily ducks her head down, and a zombie is standing behind her
A Zombie appears in front of the screen
Emily is crawling as the camera movers upwards to reveal another zombie
Dickie (the dog) turns around, and brutally kills Emily
Liza is suddenly attacked by the re-animated hotel worker
A unseen force suddenly hits Liza and John with thunderstorm, and blood starts dripping down on them
A zombie smashes through the window, and attacks Liza
The glass in a door suddenly breaks, and Dr. Harris is impaled by the glass splinter
A zombie leaps up, and attacks Liza
John opens a door, and sees a zombie slowly walking towards him and Liza
Jill suddenly attack Liza
A honking car horn startles Nicole
A man suddenly appears in the doorway as Nicole takes photos
Accompanied by a very loud sound effect, a boy appears behind a window
A demonic face briefly flashes up on Nicole’s laptop screen along with a loud sound effect
Adelina turns around quickly to reveal she is possessed
Nicole slowly approaches the door which is opening and closing by itself, suddenly she sees a screaming woman by the door trying to get in
Nicole backs away from the door and turns around to see another screaming woman standing behind her
A dog jumps up and barks at the door while Nicole is in the car
The dog jumps up at the car once more
Stefan shines the torch around the sleep-out and Adelina suddenly appears and screeches at him
While Nicole is in the bathtub, there is a loud sound effect and the lights turn off
The window slams shut
There is a knock on the door and the lights turn back on
In a dream where Nicole is having sex with Father Anton, a woman’s screaming face suddenly appears on screen and Nicole wakes up
Nicole briefly sees someone in the rear view mirror
Hands wrap around Nicole’s feet
While running through the fields, Nicole stops and turns around to see the figure from the car standing there
A low pitched demonic voice interupts Nicole’s conversation with Anton
Possessed Nicole opens her eyes as a sound effect plays
Loud rattling noises coming from the ceiling can be heard periodically over the next 30-40 seconds
More rattling noises come from the ceiling
Karl startles Chris while she is in the attic
Regan sees a demon appear for a brief moment
The scene abruptly cuts to Regan screaming
Regan spider-walks down the stairs with blood coming from her mouth
The possessed Regan vomits green liquid over Father Karras
The phone rings loudly
There is a loud moan from the upstairs bedroom
Regan sits up in bed and attacks Father Karras from behind
The house begins to shake violently
The doors to the church are blown open by a sudden gust of wind
A window is broken an a man falls out of a house
The sliding screen to the confession booth is opened quickly, startling Lieutenant Kinderman
Alice runs into Kinderman as he turns around
Damien makes a horrible roaring noise
There is a loud clattering noise as Nurse Amy is about to enter a room
A man sits up in his bed and yells at Amy. [Video]
A shrouded figure comes out of the room just behind Amy holding a large pair of scissors. [Video]
Damien yells NO! at Kinderman
Kinderman bursts into a darkened room where a nurse is seeing a patient
The priests ritual book explodes while he is performing an exorcism
There is a loud bang, and the camera footage cuts out
A lady on the television screen suddenly lunges at the camera
Maria suddenly starts to scream at Isabella
A dog barks at Isabella from behind a fence
The light turns on and Rosalita is now out of the bed and screaming at the crew
Maria suddenly starts screaming
There is a loud bang while Isabella and Ben are talking
The camera moves around the room and David is seen standing behind Ben
Laura suddenly commits suicide. No classical jump-scare but a very frightening scene with a loud bang
Grace breaks through the ice
After the dog barks, the camera shows various settings of the dark lodge. Suddenly a loud cut to Grace standing in front of the piano follows
In a nightmare Grace sees something under the ice on the lake. She suddenly breaks in
As Richard runs towards Grace, a shot is fired and kills him. Very distressing and sudden
A bat flies across the screen
A bucket is slammed to the ground
The eyes of the corpse are now open
The corpse shifts
The old man rushes out of the closet
The camera screams in Claire’s ear
Hemish bursts into the room
A demon is seen as Saul lights a lamp
A girl appears in front of Claire
The girls is standing in the room and looks up with a musical sting
As the sheet is pulled away the girl says “Help Me
Hard cut to a body coming out of a freezer
A sudden knocking at the door
The old woman startles Claire
The claws of the demon come out of the door as Claire reaches for it
A woman is seen looking under the table
Claire looks up and the demon lashes down at her
The witch grabs Caleb around the head, revealing a gnarled claw-like hand
The witch turns around and lets out a cackle
The goat attacks William
As Thomasin reaches down to touch William, Katherine suddenly pulls her away
A woman dressed in white appears in the middle of the road
Someone suddenly runs by
The woman in white suddenly turns around as Fenn puts his hand on her shoulder
A hand reaches up out of the water
Alice bends over towards Father Hagan revealing a demonic figure behind her
A demonic face suddenly appears in Fenn’s reflection as he is looking into the water
Natalie calls Fenn from behind him, but when he turns around she is a demon
An organ starts playing
The demon suddenly reaches for Father Hagan
A body hanging by a noose falls from the ceiling
A motel room door opens
A demonic face suddenly appears on the computer screen
A cover comes off a statue revealing the demon
The demon explodes out of a statue of the Virgin Mary
The demon’s face appears in the light of the match
An eye appears in the man’s belongings
A man appears in front of the camera
Banging from the coffin knocks things over
Mr. Edwards turns around
Hayley looks around with the camera and a severed hand moving around on its own causes her to scream
Hayley looks up from the ground and Mr. Edwards is running straight at her
One of the soldiers reaches out for the woman who quickly grabs him on the arm
There is a sudden loud noise during a quiet scene as someone gets attacked in another room
The police officer appears behind her
The subject runs into frame and rams into the soldier from the side
A strange creature eats a man’s face
The creature reappears
A demon hand grabs her and startles her awake
A quick cut to the Djinn in full makeup
The Djinn appears at the shower curtain
Nick appears behind Alex after she hears the Djinn whispering
A zombie version of Nick is sitting beside Alex
Someone shoves a jar of eyeballs into the camera as it proceeds down the hallway
Someone in a mask jumps right in Alex’s face with no warning
A male voice says “I’m a good boy!” and pulls on Sissy’s arm
There is a crash and the two women scream
